## RoomEvents.onReconnectStart() method

\[需启用断线重连:enabledReconnect\]每次开始断线重连时触发, \[reconnectWaitSec\]秒后开始重连

**Signature:**

```typescript
onReconnectStart(fn: (currTryCount: number) => void): void;
```
